about.heading: About Miss Mermaid
about.body: We founded Miss Mermaid on the belief that true breeding is where love, art, and genetics meet. We produce visually arresting, emotionally intuitive, and remarkably healthy Sphynx companions.

about.heading: Our Philosophy
about.body: Transparent care, ethical decision‑making, and unwavering wellbeing. Screenings, enrichment, and thoughtful placement elevate every experience for guardian and kitten.

about.heading: Our Bloodlines
about.body: We steward the legacy of CFA luminaries with meticulous pedigrees, HCM‑negative lines, and independent health testing for structure, personality, and longevity.

about.heading: Life at Miss Mermaid
about.body: Free‑roam family life, daily play, guest interactions, and immaculate grooming keep skins luminous, eyes bright, and characters secure.

about.heading: Our Mission
about.body: Elevate the global perception of the Sphynx breed through responsible breeding, transparent education, and artistry of care.

guides.title: Bathing & Skin Care
guides.body: Gentle weekly bath; avoid harsh shampoos; moisturize; clean ears and nails.

guides.title: Nutrition & Health
guides.body: High‑quality protein and hydration; regular vet visits; annual HCM screenings.

guides.title: Temperature & Comfort
guides.body: Warm spots, heated pads on low, breathable covers, sun‑safe sweaters.

faq.question: Are Sphynx cats hypoallergenic?
faq.answer: Less dander than coated breeds, but not fully hypoallergenic. Regular bathing and sheet changes help.

faq.question: Do Sphynx get cold easily?
faq.answer: They crave warmth at rest; layer clothing and keep cozy beds.

faq.question: How often to bathe?
faq.answer: About once a week or as needed; rinse thoroughly and moisturize.
